For Organizers - a list of information resources for organizers from people who have been working against the radical right for decades.



Indivisible: A Practical Guide for Resisting the Trump Agenda - Former congressional staffers reveal best practices for making Congress listen



Resistance Manual - Action begins with information. There are more of us who believe in equity and justice than those who support Donald Trump's ideology of fear and hate. Together, we can harness the collective power of the people to resist the impact of a Trump presidency and to continue to make progress in our communities.
